This fabric collects everything you come in contact with! I’ve tried everything and nothing works - hair, lint, everything!! Such a warm cozy sweatshirt - the fit was perfect! I have the white and pink and I can’t wear them :( they look so dirty and even a lint roller can’t stop them from collecting it all! Disappointed

So I LOVE the sweatshirt overall, very comfy, very soft, fits great! I got a medium & im 5’1 & roughly 120 pounds, for reference. BUTTTT. It has been “shedding” non stop ever since I opened it. It’s not like a normal shedding, it’s like, coating things in small black fuzzies? I’ve tried lint rolling (pictured above) & it won’t stop, it ruined 2 light colored pieces of clothing that was in the wash with this, & it coated our dryer in the black coating of fuzzies. & when I wear it, I breathe in the fuzzies & black fuzzies coat my nostrils, & my whatever shirt I wear underneath this gets the coating of black fuzzies also, along with my daughters clothing when I hold her. Has anyone else had this problem?? I hope after another wash maybe it will go away but I hate that this sheds so much because it truly is an amazing sweatshirt besides the shedding!
